page.title: 03Eccles Journal Newspaper 2
page.content: This newspaper has some interesting photographic records. One such photo is the old Eccles fire engine which was the first in the country to be powered by motor engine. A previous editor of the paper was { Mr.C.Jones who worked on the paper from 1924-1974. He was a St.Mary's old boy. Amongst the stories for the edition of the 26th June 1985 was one about a teenage girl who had been stabbed 3 times in the early hours of the morning in Peel Green. The police have a description of a man and are searching for him. Another story concerned Christine Stirling, a pupil from St. Mary's School. She had won a competition for designing a cover for Postman Pat books, organised by the library. She received an 8 pound book voucher.
